title: Effect of reducing sample size for online purchase

content.description: The director of a marketing department wants to estimate the proportion of people who purchase a certain product online. The director originally planned to obtain a random sample of <math alttext="2,500" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>500</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> people who purchased the product. However, because of budget concerns, the sample size will be reduced to <math alttext="1,500" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mtext>,</mtext> <mn>500</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> people.
content.question: Which of the following describes the effect of reducing the number of people in the sample?

choices.label: The variance of the sample will increase.
The variance of the population will decrease.
The variance of the sampling distribution of the estimator will increase.
The variance of the sampling distribution of the estimator will decrease.
The variance of the sampling distribution of the estimator will remain the same.

content.answer: The variance of the sampling distribution of the estimator will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
